game.name: Jester / King
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You wake up as a jester next to the king's lifeless body. You are trapped in a cursed kingdom with three love interests. Will you seek the truth, help the others, or try to escape?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You wake up as a jester next to the king's lifeless body. You are trapped in a cursed kingdom with three love interests. Will you seek the truth, help the others, or try to escape?
